https://tmrev.io/movie/915770-Carl Brown 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tBjo0rPziLmvyjD9w4h0yAn3WAu.jpg A short video documentary by Barbara Sternberg, approximating the dual-screen approach of the titular filmmaker. Brown speaks candidly, is shown in a studio; An excerpt from his film Memory Fade (2009) follows the footage. One of many of Sternberg's interviews with fellow artists. Carl Brown
